Use the cigarettes table in the melange database. Find and print all of the records for cigarettes that have an ampersand (&) in their name.

```{r q2}
library(sqldf)
db <- dbConnect(SQLite(),
  dbname="../data/melange.sqlite")
ampersand_data <- dbGetQuery(conn=db,
 "select *
    from cigarettes
    where brand_name like '%&%'")
ampersand_data
dbDisconnect(conn=db)
```
